Chen.name: Flying Kick
Chen.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage.

Chen.name: Keg Smash
Chen.description: Smash Chen's keg, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

Chen.name: Breath of Fire
Chen.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 96 (+4% per level) additional damage over 3 seconds.

Chen.name: Wandering Keg
Chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

Chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
Chen.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed.  Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

Chen.name: Fortifying Brew
Chen.description: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 196 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 588 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after he stops drinking.

ChenElementals.name: Fire
ChenElementals.description: Increase the Attack Speed of the spirits by 100% for 5 seconds.

ChenElementals.name: Earth
ChenElementals.description: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

ChenElementals.name: Storm
ChenElementals.description: Increase the Movement Speed of the spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Accumulating Flame
1.description: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%.  Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 20 Armor for every enemy Hero ignited with Breath Of Fire. This lasts for 3 seconds.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Elusive Brawler
1.description: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Keg Toss
4.description: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 80.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

4.name: Ring of Fire
4.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.name: Bolder Flavor
7.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 294 (+4% per level). Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

7.name: Purifying Brew
7.description: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 12 seconds. While Chen has an active Shield from Fortifying Brew, gain 40 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed.  Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

13.name: Withering Flames
13.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Another Round
16.description: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Enough to Share
16.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 (+4% per level) per second.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 60 Armor, reducing damage taken by 60%.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.  Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable.  Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.  Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

20.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
20.description: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.
